<title level="1" pfs="">[Anadi Seeker](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1606)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Anadi seekers are knowledge seekers who often brave the outside world.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 17

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 15

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 12
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 1">[Anadi Seeker](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1606)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="CG" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Anadi" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=255" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=91" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #169: Kindled Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=94) pg. 78</row>

**Perception** +7

**Languages**
[Anadi](/Languages.aspx?ID=46), [Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1)

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +6, [Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=2) +7, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +4, [Crafting](/Skills.aspx?ID=4) +7, [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10) +5, [Occultism](/Skills.aspx?ID=11) +7

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +1

**Dex** +3

**Con** -1

**Int** +4

**Wis** +2

**Cha** +0
</row>

**Items**
[Sling](/Weapons.aspx?ID=72) (20 sling bullets)

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 15 

**Fort** +4 

**Ref** +10 

**Will** +7 

</row>

**HP** 20

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet, climb 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
fangs +8 ([Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179)),
**Damage** 1d6+1 piercing plus anadi venom

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
sling +8 ([Propulsive](/Traits.aspx?ID=191), [range increment 50 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248), [reload 1](/Traits.aspx?ID=254)),
**Damage** 1d6 bludgeoning

**Arcane Innate Spells** DC 17
- **Cantrips (1st)**
[Dancing Lights](/Spells.aspx?ID=58), [Detect Magic](/Spells.aspx?ID=66), [Mage Hand](/Spells.aspx?ID=177), [Read Aura](/Spells.aspx?ID=246), [Shield](/Spells.aspx?ID=280)
- **1st**
[Color Spray](/Spells.aspx?ID=44), [Magic Missile](/Spells.aspx?ID=180), [Unseen Servant](/Spells.aspx?ID=352)

**Anadi Venom**  ([Poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126)) **Saving Throw** DC 15 Fortitude; **Maximum Duration** 4 rounds; **Stage 1** 1d6 poison damage and [flat-footed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=16) (1 round); **Stage 2** 1d6 poison damage, flat-footed, and [clumsy 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=3) (1 round)

**Change Shape** <actions string="Single Action" /> ([Arcane](/Traits.aspx?ID=11), [Concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=32), [Polymorph](/Traits.aspx?ID=127), [Transmutation](/Traits.aspx?ID=157)) The anadi changes into their hybrid, spider, or human form. The above statistics assume the anadi is in hybrid form. While in human form, the anadi seeker loses their climb Speed and can't use their fangs attack. When in spider form, they can't use weapons.

**Spin Silk**  ([Concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=32), [Exploration](/Traits.aspx?ID=66), [Manipulate](/Traits.aspx?ID=104)) By spending several minutes, an anadi can produce silk to craft items made of cloth. An anadi can produce enough silk in a day to craft a single garment.

</column>
